Fully Custom Profiles

Fully Custom Profiles contains any profile's intial values you add. Profile initial values define the initial values for the corresponding inports of profile(s) in a system definition file.

What do you want to do?

Add profile

To add a profile, click the Add Profile button. You also can right-click this item in the configuration tree and select Add Profile from the shortcut menu.

Remove profile

To remove a profile, click the Remove Profile button. You also can right-click this item in the configuration tree and select Remove Profile from the shortcut menu.

Change the number of teeth for profiles

To change the number of teeth used by fully custom profiles within this section, modify the numeric control named Number of Teeth on the page below.

View or change a fully custom profile

To view or change a fully custom profile, select the profile item in the configuration tree. The Fully Custom Profile page appears to the right of the configuration tree.

For more information about adding and configuring custom devices, refer to the Configuring and Running a Project book of the NI VeriStand Help, available by selecting Help»Search the NI VeriStand Help.
